      • calculateAverage

        public java.lang.String calculateAverage(int[] scores)
        Name:calculateAverage
        this method allows to calculate the average time of the races of each pilot. Post: The average time of each pilot has been calculated
        Parameters:
        scores[] - int. Variable with the amount of time each driver can get in each race. scores[]!=null
        Returns:
        double variable that keep the average time of the races of each pilot.

      • timeConverter

        public java.lang.String timeConverter(int num)
        Name:timeConverter
        This method allows you to convert the time from seconds to hours, minutes, and seconds. Post: The time conversion has been done.
        Parameters:
        num - double. Variable with the amount of time in second each driver. num!=null.
        Returns:
        double variable that keep the time in second of each pilot.
